alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 4:38PM CDT until July 05 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lee County in north central Illinois... Southern De Kalb County in north central Illinois... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 437 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 1 mile north of Paw Paw, or near Shabbona, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sandwich, Shabbona, Hinckley, Somonauk, Waterman, Paw Paw, Lee, Compton and Steward. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 78 and 96. I-88 between mile markers 100 and 101. This includes... Sandwich Fairgrounds. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
